title: vAraNa mukhanE
sahitya:
vAraNa mukhanE vA marai mudark-kAraNap-poruLE vA kanivuDan


anupallavi

  nAraNan sOdari shankari shelvA OmkAra svarUpA tuNai puri varadA


caraNam    kadiroLi vIshunin pAda sEvaiyAl hrdayAmbujam malara bhaktiyuDan nAn
 kanirasamanna kavinayam ponga gAnattinAl pErAnandam peravaruL
